name: Switchboard Panic
description:
In "Switchboard Panic" you assume the role of an old-school telephone switchboard operator. Connect the correct people's calls to increase your score.

Will you go for multiple shorter calls to get multiple end-of-call bonuses, or hope that you'll be able to finish all the longer calls before you run out of cables? You have 2 minutes, time is ticking...

Controls:

Left mouse button to pull paper with the list of names, grab and place wires.

Right mouse button removes wire pairs.

Programming:

Crystal Clod and Supahstar Clod

Visual Design/ Audio:

Janne Sala (ThePopStarDude)
